title: 15 Bad ETH Takes with Justin Drake
itunes:title: 15 Bad ETH Takes with Justin Drake
description:
Kicking off Merge Week with a livestream with Ethereum researcher Justin Drake, it's time to debunk some myths and bad takes about ETH.

As we watch Ethereum make its historic transition to Proof-of-Stake, we explore claims against the merge, the Ethereum Roadmap, ETH supply, and many others.
